question: If the Earth did not tilt on its axis in relation to the sun, which of the following would also be true?
candidate_answers: (A) There would be no seasons. (B) One Earth-year would be 14% longer. (C) The Earth would spin at a different rate. (D) Temperatures at the Earth's equator would cool.
answer: Temperatures at the Earth's equator would cool.
label: D
